name: fsfs-monorepo
description: FSFS - Forum, Social, Forum, Reels Application (TypeScript + React + Express)

scripts.dev: npm run dev --workspace=backend & npm run dev --workspace=frontend
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=backend && npm run build --workspace=frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm install --workspace=backend --legacy-peer-deps && npm install --workspace=frontend --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=backend && npm run lint --workspace=frontend

author: Your Name
